column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////3) Steak and Frites with a side of Garlic Aoili: We ordered the steak cooked to a medium temperature and it came out perfect. We used some of the steak salt that was provided as a side to the dish
column2: which I enjoyed since many restaurants oversalt their steaks. Nothing about the steak really stood out to me flavor wise
column3: it was good but nothing to write home about in comparison to other steakhouses in the neighborhood. The frites
column5: were outstanding and quickly disappeared along with the garlic aoili.
